sentences.english: The star is about 10,000 light-years from Earth, in the constellation Centaurus. [Photo of the massive star.]
sentences.chinese: 该星体距离地球大约一万光年，位于半人马座。

sentences.english: The cluster lies 2600 light-years from Earth in the constellation of Monoceros.
sentences.chinese: 这棵“树”实际是距离地球2600光年的麒麟星座。

sentences.english: Took back-to-back to more distant light years.
sentences.chinese: 毅然背对背走向更远的光年。

sentences.english: A light-year is about 6 trillion miles, the distance light travels in a year.
sentences.chinese: 一光年大约6百亿亿英里，即光行走一年的距离。

sentences.english: At that distance, this image would be about 300 light-years across.
sentences.chinese: 在那个距离，这张图约宽300光年。

sentences.english: Please give me a million light years more time, so I show you your fill.
sentences.chinese: 请再多给我一万光年的时间，好让我把你看个够。

sentences.english: MACS 1206 lies 4.5 billion light-years from Earth.
But Sasselov’s thoughts were light-years away.
sentences.chinese: 但塞萨洛夫的思想早就飘到了光年之外。

sentences.english: Flows out as the waves of Milky years.
sentences.chinese: 丰腴的波浪流淌成光年，那杳渺的蓝色。

sentences.english: The x-ray jet in the upper left extends for about 13, 000 light years away from the black hole.
sentences.chinese: 左上的X射线喷流从黑洞延伸到13000光年远。

sentences.english: Silent light, thoughts spread, those hiding in the old days respectively.
sentences.chinese: 静默光年，思绪蔓延，那些隐藏在分别中的旧时光。

sentences.english: The brightest star in the constellation Cygnus, approximately1,630 light-years from Earth.
sentences.chinese: 鹅座最亮的一颗恒星，距地球大约有1，630光年。

sentences.english: The Oort Cloud is thought to extend about 1 light year from the Sun.
sentences.chinese: 欧特云团距太阳1光年距离。

sentences.english: I was light-years from such a feat.
sentences.chinese: 我离这样的壮举还有好几光年的距离呢。
从十亿光年到零点一费米。

definition: see 恆星系|恒星系[heng2 xing1 xi4]
extragalactic star system/galaxy (not including our Galaxy)
